Body.tooltip: Always Suitless: body never appears suited. Default: body only appears suited when player is wearing space suit. Always Suited: body always appears suited. Opposite: body appears suitless when space suit is worn, and suited when space suit is not worn.

Head.tooltip: Always Suitless: head never appears helmeted. Default: head only appears helmeted when player is wearing space suit. Always Suited: head always appears helmeted. Opposite: head appears helmetless when space suit is worn, and helmeted when space suit is not worn.

Right Arm.tooltip: Always Suitless: arm never appears suited. Default: arm only appears suited when player is wearing space suit. Always Suited: arm always appears suited. Opposite: arm appears suitless when space suit is worn, and suited when space suit is not worn.

Left Arm.tooltip: Always Suitless: arm never appears suited. Default: arm only appears suited when player is wearing space suit. Always Suited: arm always appears suited. Opposite: arm appears suitless when space suit is worn, and suited when space suit is not worn.

Jetpack.tooltip: Always Suitless: jetpack never appears Default: jetpack only appears when player is wearing space suit. Always Suited: jetpack always appears. Opposite: jetpack doesn't appear when space suit is worn, but does appear when space suit is not worn.

Missing Body.tooltip: The body will be completely invisible.

Missing Head.tooltip: The head will be completely invisible.

Missing Left Arm.tooltip: The left arm will be completely invisible.

Missing Right Arm.tooltip: The right arm will be completely invisible.
